item.title: By: momgateway
item.dc:creator: momgateway
item.description: love the veggies in the rolls...can't get enough of them!
item.content:encoded: love the veggies in the rolls…can’t get enough of them!

item.title: By: Amy @ cookbookmaniac.com
item.dc:creator: Amy @ cookbookmaniac.com
item.description: I much prefer these over sausage rolls any day! They look perfectly crispy and filled with the type of goodness that could make me happy. Yum!
item.content:encoded: I much prefer these over sausage rolls any day! They look perfectly crispy and filled with the type of goodness that could make me happy. Yum!

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: Great idea...love the veggies in it...so colorful and tasty. Must taste so yummie in puff dough.
item.content:encoded: Great idea…love the veggies in it…so colorful and tasty. Must taste so yummie in puff dough.

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Great idea! I use puff pastry to make savory palmiers and this would be a similar recipe. Never thought to fill it with veggies. What a super treat for the kids...
item.content:encoded: Great idea! I use puff pastry to make savory palmiers and this would be a similar recipe. Never thought to fill it with veggies. What a super treat for the kids…

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: all I can think of is that flaky pastry with loads of poppyseeds ontop. You're right, its a great way to get more veggies into you!
item.content:encoded: all I can think of is that flaky pastry with loads of poppyseeds ontop. You’re right, its a great way to get more veggies into you!

item.title: By: betty
item.dc:creator: betty
item.description: these look so good. nice way to use up my puff pastry :O)
item.content:encoded: these look so good. nice way to use up my puff pastry :O)

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: Hmmm... I'm constantly searching for ways to make my nephew love vegetables. I remember when I was young it was a chore to eat veggies - having it in a roll is great as I know all kids of rolls.. I could tell him it is a surprise sausage roll - the surprise? No sausage but just as delicious!
item.content:encoded: Hmmm… I’m constantly searching for ways to make my nephew love vegetables. I remember when I was young it was a chore to eat veggies – having it in a roll is great as I know all kids of rolls.. I could tell him it is a surprise sausage roll – the surprise? No sausage but just as delicious!

item.title: By: Von
item.dc:creator: Von
item.description: These look so much better than sausage rolls....! I love pretty much anything with puff pastry, and I love vegetables too- these are my type of party snack :)
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: They look great Anita! And yes whilst technically puff pastry isn't healthy I think your filling is loads healthier than others yet still sounds tasty! :D
